tool_description: Download Tidal songs, albums, playlists and podcasts to MP3.
name: Tidal Music MP3
title: Tidal Music MP3

api_list.name: TMC Points
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tidal-music-mp3.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tidal-music-mp3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tidal-music-mp3.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tidal-music-mp3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
